title: "Task Master Wallpapers"
content: Task Master Wallpapers provides you with a simple yet effective way to keep track of your daily tasks and to-do lists. Our digital calendar wallpaper is designed to provide you with the perfect space to jot down important notes and reminders, ensuring that you never forget a task again. With its minimalist design, our wallpaper is the perfect addition to any workspace, providing you with a clean and clutter-free environment that helps you stay focused and productive throughout the day. Whether you're a busy professional or a student with a lot on your plate, Task Master Wallpapers is the perfect tool to help you stay organized and on top of your tasks.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a simple graphic of a digital calendar or to-do list, with space for notes and reminders."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
